Requirements You are wielding a shield.

You brace your shield with both hands, enhancing its potential for both offense and defense. When in this stance, you wield the shield with both hands. When wielding a shield this way, increase the weapon damage die of the shield's boss or spikes by one step, and increase the shield's Hardness by 2 when using the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Shield Block]{Shield Block} reaction.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Stance: Everstand Stance]{Stance: Everstand Stance}
